column7: This studio extends typographic study with representational strategies for image reproduction technology. Students engage in practices for incorporating existing and created imagery into typographic systems. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTD 222 and ARTD 251.
column9: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTD 222 and ARTD 251.
column11: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
